replies.body: a little late but all i did was run as administrator:>

Maestro errors are generally a result of your client not being able to establish a solid link to the service. Going through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) would be my recommended first step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
